name: The Chicken Family
summary: Embark on an adventure with a daring and determined hen, as she sets out to rescue her chicks from treacherous cages. Use your wit and puzzle-solving skills to navigate through challenging levels filled with obstacles, traps, bridges, and more. Collect cookies, gems, and coins along the way, unlocking new levels, worlds, and customization options. Help the hen lead her chicks safely to the coop, but be careful not to fall off the platforms or get stopped by rolling barrels and sharp traps. With vibrant, cartoon-style graphics and exciting, fast-paced gameplay, this low poly 3D platformer puzzle game is a delightful experience that will keep you entertained for hours. So gather your courage, grab your key, and join the hen on her quest to save her chicks and become the ultimate chick hero.
